trans-unit.source: Await {0} instead
trans-unit.target: Esperam por {0} em vez disso
trans-unit.note: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated. {0} is a method name.

trans-unit.source: Use await instead
trans-unit.target: Uso aguardam em vez disso
trans-unit.note: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously waiting on tasks or awaiters is dangerous and may cause dead locks. Please consider the following options: 1) Switch to asynchronous wait if the caller is already a "async" method. 2) Change the chain of callers to be "async" methods, and then change this code to be asynchronous await. 3) Use JoinableTaskFactory.Run() to wait on the tasks or awaiters. Refer to http://blogs.msdn.com/b/andrewarnottms/archive/2014/05/07/asynchronous-and-multithreaded-programming-within-vs-using-the-joinabletaskfactory.aspx for more info.
trans-unit.target: Síncrona espera nas tarefas ou awaiters é perigosa e pode causar bloqueios de morto. Por favor, considere as seguintes opções: 1) alternar para wait assíncrono se o chamador já é um método de "async". 2) alteração da cadeia de chamadores para ser "async" métodos e altere esse código para ser assíncrono aguardam. 3) Utilize JoinableTaskFactory.Run() para aguardar as tarefas ou awaiters. Consulte http://blogs.msdn.com/b/andrewarnottms/archive/2014/05/07/asynchronous-and-multithreaded-programming-within-vs-using-the-joinabletaskfactory.aspx para mais informação.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
"await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid problematic synchronous waits
trans-unit.target: Síncrona espera nas tarefas ou awaiters é perigosa e pode causar bloqueios de morto.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio service "{0}" should be used on main thread explicitly. Please either verify the current thread is main thread, or switch to main thread asynchronously. 1) APIs to verify the current thread is main thread: ThreadHelper.ThrowIfNotOnUIThread(), or IThreadHandling.VerifyOnUIThread(). 2) APIs to switch to main thread asynchronously: JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync(), or IThreadHandling.SwitchToUIThread(). Refer to http://blogs.msdn.com/b/andrewarnottms/archive/2014/05/07/asynchronous-and-multithreaded-programming-within-vs-using-the-joinabletaskfactory.aspx for more info.
trans-unit.target: Serviço Visual Studio "{0}" deve ser usado explicitamente no thread principal. Ou verifique se o thread atual é a thread principal, ou alternar para o thread principal de forma assíncrona. 1) APIs para verificar se o thread atual é a thread principal: ThreadHelper.ThrowIfNotOnUIThread(), ou IThreadHandling.VerifyOnUIThread(). 2) APIs para alternar a principal linha de forma assíncrona: JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync(), ou IThreadHandling.SwitchToUIThread(). Consulte a http://blogs.msdn.com/b/andrewarnottms/archive/2014/05/07/asynchronous-and-multithreaded-programming-within-vs-using-the-joinabletaskfactory.aspx para mais informação.

trans-unit.source: Use VS services from UI thread
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio de serviço deve ser usado no thread principal explicitamente.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid Async Void method, because any exceptions thrown out of an async void method will be raised directly on the SynchronizationContext and will crash the process. Refer to https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/jj991977.aspx for more info.
trans-unit.target: Evite método Async Void, porque todas as exceções lançadas fora de um método de vazio async serão geradas diretamente sobre o SynchronizationContext e travará o processo. Consulte a https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/jj991977.aspx para mais informação.
trans-unit.note: "async void" is a pair of C# keywords. Do not translate them.

trans-unit.source: Avoid async void methods
trans-unit.target: Evite o método Async Void.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
"async void" is a pair of C# keywords. Do not translate them.

trans-unit.source: Avoid using async lambda as void returning delegate type, because any exceptions thrown out of an async lambda returning void will be raised directly on the SynchronizationContext and will crash the process. Refer to https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/jj991977.aspx for more info.
trans-unit.target: Evite usar async lambda como tipo de retorno void delegado, porque todas as exceções lançadas fora uma lambda async retornar void serão geradas diretamente sobre o SynchronizationContext e travará o processo. Consulte a https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/jj991977.aspx para mais informação.
trans-unit.note: "void" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid unsupported async delegates
trans-unit.target: Async lambda está sendo usado como a tipo de retorno void delegado.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: AsyncEventHandler delegates should be invoked via the extension method "TplExtensions.InvokeAsync()" defined in Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading assembly.
trans-unit.target: Delegados de AsyncEventHandler devem ser chamados através do método de extensão "TplExtensions.InvokeAsync()" definida no assembly Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading.

trans-unit.source: Use InvokeAsync to raise async events
trans-unit.target: Delegados de AsyncEventHandler devem ser chamados através do método de extensão "TplExtensions.InvokeAsync()" definida no assembly Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Calling await on a Task inside a JoinableTaskFactory.Run, when the task is initialized outside the delegate can cause potential deadlocks. You can avoid this problem by ensuring the task is initialized within the delegate or by using JoinableTask instead of Task.
trans-unit.target: Chamando aguardam em uma tarefa dentro de um JoinableTaskFactory.Run, quando a tarefa é inicializada fora o delegado pode causar deadlocks potenciais. , Você pode evitar este problema, garantindo que a tarefa é inicializada dentro do delegado ou usando JoinableTask ao invés de tarefa.

trans-unit.source: Avoid awaiting non-joinable tasks in join contexts
trans-unit.target: Evitar chamando aguardam a tarefa dentro de "JoinableTaskFactory.Run" delegado quando a tarefa é definida fora o delegado para evitar deadlocks potenciais.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Calling Lazy<Task<T>>.Value can deadlock when the value factory was previously started. You should use AsyncLazy<T> instead.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o preguiçoso<Task<T>>. Valor pode bloqueio quando a fábrica de valor anteriormente foi iniciada. , Você deve usar o AsyncLazy<T> em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: Avoid using Lazy<T> where T is a Task<T2>
trans-unit.target: Evite usar Lazy <T> , onde T é uma tarefa.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: The {0} member synchronously blocks. Call {1} instead and await its result.
trans-unit.target: O membro {0} sincronicamente bloqueia. Chamar {1} em vez disso e aguarde o seu resultado.

trans-unit.source: The {0} member synchronously blocks. Use await instead.
trans-unit.target: O membro {0} sincronicamente bloqueia. Uso aguardam em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: Call async methods when in an async method
trans-unit.target: Chame awaitable alternativas quando em um método assíncrono.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Limit use of synchronously blocking method calls such as JoinableTaskFactory.Run or Task.Result to public entrypoint members where you must be synchronous. Using it for internal members can needlessly add synchronous frames between asynchronous frames, leading to threadpool exhaustion.
trans-unit.target: Limite de uso de forma síncrona, bloquear chamadas de método como JoinableTaskFactory.Run ou Task.Result para público entrypoint Membros onde você deve ser síncrono. Usá-lo para membros internos desnecessariamente pode adicionar quadros síncronos entre quadros assíncronos, conduzindo ao esgotamento do pool de threads.

trans-unit.source: Implement internal logic asynchronously
trans-unit.target: Evite blocos síncronos em métodos não-públicos.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

{0} is a method name.

trans-unit.source: Use "Async" suffix in names of Task-returning methods.
trans-unit.target: Use o sufixo "Async" em nomes de método de retorno de tarefa.

trans-unit.source: Use "Async" suffix for async methods
trans-unit.target: Use o sufixo "Async" em nomes de método de retorno de tarefa.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Change return type to Task
trans-unit.target: Change return type to Task
trans-unit.note: Task is a type name and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current. Use an overload that accepts a TaskScheduler and specify TaskScheduler.Default (or any other) explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current. Use an overload that accepts a TaskScheduler and specify TaskScheduler.Default (or any other) explicitly.

trans-unit.source: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current
trans-unit.target: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current
